actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 94-557.

official_title: A resolution referring the bill (H.R. 3374) for the relief of John J. Egan to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 3374, for the relief of John J. Egan, to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims, pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

titles.title: A resolution referring the bill (H.R. 3374) for the relief of John J. Egan to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.
